blockinactive-desc: Siw obiara a wamfa ne din ne ne password nni dwuma nna dodow bi akyi fi da a atwa to a wɔde wɔn din ne password dii dwuma.
blockinactive: Siw dwumadi a wɔyɛɛ ho adwuma akyɛ.
blockinactive-table-inactivetime: Bere a dwumadi biara nkɔ so
blockinactive-config-threshold: Nna ahorow a yebetumi aka sɛ account no da hɔ kwa a dwumadi biara nkɔ so
blockinactive-config-daysblock: Nna a wobetumi afi ase asiw dwumadi hokwan
blockinactive-config-warningdaysleft: Nna ahorow a yɛde dwumadi a yesiw hokwan kɔkɔbɔ ma
blockinactive-config-mail-subject: Kɔkɔbɔ! Ɛrenkye yɛbesiw wo wiki dwumadi ho kwan.
blockinactive-config-mail-body: Ɛrenkyɛ yebesiw wo wiki account hokwan efisɛ wode dii dwuma akyɛ. Sɛ wompɛ sɛ yesiw wo account no ano a, yɛserɛwo sɛ bɔ wo din ne wo password wɔ {{SITENAME}}, eyi bɛma wo account no ano akɔ so ada hɔ.
blockinactive-config-mail-block-subject: Wonni wo wiki account no hokwan anaa yesiw ano.
blockinactive-config-mail-block-body: Yesiw wo wiki account no ano efisɛ wode dii dwuma akyɛ. Sɛ wopɛsɛ wode wo account do di dwuma a, yɛsrɛ wo hu {{SITENAME}} system administrator.
action-blockinactive: siw dwumadi a wɔyɛɛ ho adwuma akyɛ
right-blockinactive: Siw dwumadi a wɔyɛɛ ho adwuma akyɛ.
